title: Rabbit, bacon and thyme pie
ingredients: ['For the filling', '2 wild rabbits', '225g (8 oz) plain flour', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 large onion', '250g (9 oz) unsmoked streaky bacon', '110g (4 oz) butter', '1 drizzle olive oil', '2 cloves garlic', '2 1/2 teaspoons chopped fresh thyme', '600ml (2 pt) chicken stock (cubes fine)', 'a little milk', 'For the pastry', '225g (8 oz) plain flour', '1 pinch salt', '110g (4 oz) cubed cold butter', '5 tablespoons cold water']
